    • Method Detail

      • setPlayerEventListener

        public void setPlayerEventListener(PlayerView.PlayerEventListener listener)
        Parameters:
        listener - Hock callback for Player event

      • addNewPlayer

        public void addNewPlayer(java.util.LinkedList<java.util.HashMap> playerDataList,
                         int initPosition)
        Create a new PlayerScrollView and put into PlayerMainView's center as child view
        Parameters:
        playerDataList - The linkedlist contains HashMaps <key, value> key will be the data need to be input, while value will be the content.
        initPosition - The param determines the init position when player start playing
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView, PlayerMainView

      • removeOldPlayer

        public void removeOldPlayer(int direction)
        Delete an old PlayerScrollView and remove it from PlayerMainView with specific direction
        Parameters:
        direction - Specify which PlayerScrollView should be removed
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView, PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView

      • moveToPlayer

        public void moveToPlayer(int direction)
        Change the Player page according to input
        Parameters:
        direction - Specify which page should be shown after the api called
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView

      • moveToPosition

        public void moveToPosition(int position)
        Change the Player currently playing item
        Parameters:
        position - Specify which playing item should be player immediately after api called
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView, PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView

        public void showDetail()

      • refreshPlayerDetail

        public void refreshPlayerDetail(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> dataMap)
        Update the Player detail information
        Parameters:
        dataMap - contains <key, value> which cooresponding to input string and the view id , the view id is the view to show one data
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView, PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView

      • moveDetailPage

        public void moveDetailPage(int index)
        Playing item may have more than one page, the api make Player show different playing detail
        Parameters:
        index - the page of playing detail information
        See Also:
        PlayerMainView, PlayerMainView.PlayerScrollView
